sentences.en: An accident at the power station could result in large amounts of radiation being released.
sentences.cn: 发电站事故会造成大量核辐射泄漏。

sentences.en: He reacted very badly to the radiation therapy.
sentences.cn: 他接受放射治疗，副作用很大。

sentences.en: Her hair started falling out as a result of radiation treatment.
sentences.cn: 由于放疗，她开始掉头发。

sentences.en: His treatment was a combination of surgery, radiation and drugs.
sentences.cn: 对他的治疗是把手术、放射和药物治疗结合为一体。

sentences.en: In the accident, the workers received a heavy dose of radiation.
sentences.cn: 在那次事故中, 工人受到大剂量的辐射.

sentences.en: Radiation has a strong effect on the heredity of fruit flies.
sentences.cn: 射线对于果蝇的遗传产生强烈的作用.

sentences.en: Radiation may damage cells in a way that was previously unforeseen.
sentences.cn: 辐射可能以一种我们过去未能预见到的方式破坏细胞。

sentences.en: Sun creams work by blocking harmful ultraviolet radiation.
sentences.cn: 防晒霜可隔离有害的紫外线辐射。

sentences.en: The material can absorb outward-going radiation from the Earth.
sentences.cn: 该物质可以吸收地球向外辐射的能量。

sentences.en: The most terrifying aspect of nuclear bombing is radiation.
sentences.cn: 核轰炸最可怕的方面是核辐射.

sentences.en: The radioactive material is stored in a special radiation - proof container.
sentences.cn: 放射性材料储存在防辐射的特殊容器里.

sentences.en: The satellite will study energy radiation from stars.
sentences.cn: 这颗人造卫星将用来研究恒星的能量辐射。

sentences.en: Their cancers are not so clearly tied to radiation exposure.
sentences.cn: 他们的癌症是否和接触放射线有关还不太清楚。

sentences.en: Then we got involved with trying to find polymers that attenuate radiation.
sentences.cn: 接著我们致力于找出能够减弱辐射的聚合物.

sentences.en: We used a combined regimen of injection treatment and radiation therapy.
sentences.cn: 我们采用了针剂注射和放射治疗相结合的方法.
